title: Fern Varieties Quiz
description: Ferns are among the oldest plants on Earth! How well do you know these ancient, graceful non-flowering plants?

questions.question: Which popular indoor fern has arching fronds with small rounded leaflets and is often hung in baskets?
What is the term for the small brown dots or clusters found on the undersides of fern fronds?
Which fern is named for its resemblance to a deer trophy mount and is often grown on boards?
Ferns reproduce using spores rather than what?
Which delicate fern has fan-shaped leaflets on dark, wiry stems and thrives in high humidity?
What is the tightly coiled young frond of a fern called before it unfurls?
Which fern has a rosette of simple, undivided fronds and is commonly grown as a houseplant?
The Japanese Painted Fern is prized for what distinctive feature?
options: Its ability to grow in full sun

questions.question: Which large fern produces fiddleheads that are commonly eaten as a spring vegetable?
How long have ferns existed on Earth?
Which fern gets its name from furry rhizomes that creep over the soil surface like animal feet?
What tall, tree-like fern can grow up to 60 feet in tropical rainforests?
Which fern is named for the cinnamon-colored fertile fronds it produces in the center?
The Resurrection Fern gets its name because it can do what during drought?
options: Drop all its fronds and regrow them
Curl up and appear dead, then revive with water

questions.question: Which floating aquatic fern can double its population in just a few days?
